name: Zero Hour Game Jam 2021
description:
This game was made as a part of the Zero Hour Game Jam 2021.

How to play:

  • Use WASD or arrowkeys to change gravity direction.
  • Collect the key and open the cage, then head for the exit.
  • Avoid the monsters.

It was made in 0 hours, 0 minutes, 0, seconds by:

  • Robert Esbjörnsson
  • Edvin Edenhage
